name: Speed Friending
description: Speed Friending is like speed dating, but for making friends. It's a great way to meet a lot of new people in a short amount of time.
basicRules: Arrange the chairs in two rows facing each other.
Half of the players sit in one row, and the other half sit in the other row.
Set a timer for a few minutes (e.g., 3-5 minutes).
Players talk to the person sitting opposite them until the timer goes off.
When the timer goes off, one row of players moves down one seat, and the conversations start again.
This continues until everyone has had a chance to talk to everyone else in the other row.
At the end, you can have a more informal mingling session where people can continue conversations with the people they found interesting.
tips: Have some conversation starter questions ready in case people get stuck.
Encourage people to exchange contact information if they want to.
Keep the atmosphere light and fun.
